Articles.Content:
Two Kerbals to low Kerbin orbit.

Launches on a Atlas V

Returns for a horizontal landing

**Edited <time datetime="2015-04-22T18:06:56Z" title="04/22/2015 06:06  PM" data-short="9 yr">April 22, 2015</time> by FlyingBeaver**

Wow.. this is really good looking.

Repped!
I love it! Probably the best stock Dream Chaser replica out there! ![:)](//kerbal-forum-uploads.s3.us-west-2.amazonaws.com/emoticons/default_k_smiley.gif ":)")
Cool but shouldn't this be in the Spacecraft Exchange..?
